title: cryptoheadd
author: cryptoheadd
content: Up for auction: 2016 Worldly Treasures Series A Set #02ANN Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1670450.0These coins are graded MS69 & MS68 and are loaded with 0.02BTC along with every other fork. (Loaded by Chronicsky) 2016 Worldly Treasures Block-halving Set #02ANN Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1946010.0Both of these are a part of the lot, so you'd be bidding on both of them. Starting Bid:  0.01 BTC (Loaded value is 0.02BTC - this would be paid on top of the winning bid.)Minimum Bid Increment: 0.0005 BTCEnds: 2nd August 2022 12:00 AM ISTCount Down for the same: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/launch?iso=20220802T00&p0=44&ud=1&font=cursive&csz=1Shipping: Would be done via DHL. Cost: On actuals - should be around $25- Any bid made in last 10 minutes will extend the auction 10 minutes beyond end time until no new bids are made.- Payment due within 24 hours of auction end

comments.author: cryptoheadd
comments.body: Quote from: Hookzup1 on July 27, 2022, 02:54:10 PM.01BTCCurrent highest bid. Around 3 days ~6 hours to go now!

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: Can you post the public keys for the funded coins please?

comments.author: cryptoheadd
comments.body: Quote from: Hookzup1 on July 31, 2022, 03:55:12 AMCan you post the public keys for the funded coins please?Hey Hookzup1,I just called Chronicsky and have asked him to share the same with me. The coin was loaded by him and we got it graded by ANACs in ~2016 with MJ's help. This auction payment would be contingent on me sharing this with the winner. (Of course)¬† I'll share it as soon as I get it from Sky - will also ask him to post here when he's available. @av8rjeff - I can understand if you want to opt out of the auction till then! Apologies for the inconvenience. Vibhor
